resources.string: Please open the permission PERMISSION_READ_PHONE_STATE to us.Otherwise, the app may not work properly
Please open the permission PERMISSION_ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION to us.Otherwise, the app may not work properly
Please open the permission PERMISSION_ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION to us.Otherwise, the app may not work properly
Please open the permission PERMISSION_READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE to us.Otherwise, the app may not work properly
Please open the permission PERMISSION_WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE to us.Otherwise, the app may not work properly
NETS CASH will have access to your address book.
